We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private OnBalanceVolume _obv;
// In Initialize()
_obv = OBV(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_obv.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "OBV Is Ready", _obv.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "OBV Warm Up Period", _obv.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "OBV Current", _obv.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "OBV Name", _obv.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "OBV Samples", _obv.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.obv = self.OBV(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.obv.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "OBV Is Ready", self.obv.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "OBV Warm Up Period", self.obv.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "OBV Current", self.obv.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "OBV Name", self.obv.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "OBV Samples", self.obv.Samples);
}
